channel.title: [PI] load scripts error
channel.description:
when following "the basics of Project-insanity" made me laugh so hard since its basics i got this error
Loading scripts... .\Data\scripts\player\eat\eat.py .\Data\scripts\player\items\spade.py .\Data\scripts\player\npc\npc1.py .\Data\scripts\player\npc\npc2.py Exception in thread "main" Traceback (innermost last): (no code object) at line 0 SyntaxError: ('invalid syntax', ('', 21, 25, 'def npcClick2_NPC_ID(c, 250):')) Press any key to continue . . .
any idea?

item.title: [PI] load scripts error
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

ok will do…can you also check out the post i just added i got 100 compile rrors …
and ty

edit:
i already had it on npc1 hmm maybe i just shouldnt add shops

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] load scripts error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I just checked, and NPC 250 (Lady of the Lake) doesn’t have a second click option, that code you added is for second click not first click.

Try adding this to npc1.py

def npcClick1_250(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(19)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] load scripts error
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

deathschaos9:

Did you add the correct NPC ID? (Post a snippet of the code you added ;))

def npcClick2_250(c, npcid): c.getShops().openShop(19)

and ive added the shop in spawn config too

item.title: [PI] load scripts error
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

NPC_ID Should be a number

EDIT: It would be helpful if you posted the code, as not having a number is only part of the problem (I think)

EDIT2: I see the problem, it should be def npcClick2_1337(c, npcId):

Read full topic
